attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the monies collected would be used to take the unemployed away from the signing on figures ,they would be then positioned on each street corner and collect a nominal ammout from the walking public. they would also double up as street/community wardens reporting and issuning people with fines for litter dropping etc...reporting any anti social behaviour to the police direct and act as official witness in any court case that may follow.this tax would also stop people hanging around on the streets and people would only come out of their house if they had a real need to......it would also re enfore family values. excempitions for the tax would be for the strrets that you live in, apart from that you pay for walking on all others.....
